subject: Football
lead_paragraph: A former cornerback for the Detroit Lions and inventor of the zone blitz, Dick LeBeau is now the mastermind behind the Pittsburgh Steelers’ defense, the N.F.L.’s best.
snippet: A former cornerback for the Detroit Lions and inventor of the zone blitz, Dick LeBeau is now the mastermind behind the Pittsburgh Steelers’ defense, the N.F.L.’s best.
